timeline.author: matthiasblaesing

replies.bodyText: @matthiasblaesing  I am implementing AutoClosable on SimpleTitleParser as suggested.
replies.author: Rahul-khandelwal

timeline.bodyText: The NOI18N comment does not belong here, the comment is IMHO unnecessary, as "unescapeHTML" is pretty self-explaining.
timeline.author: matthiasblaesing

timeline.message:
[NETBEANS-4176] Unescape javadoc title after parsing

Javadoc title for JDK 11 contains &.
We are fixing that in this commit.

[NETBEANS-4176] Unescape javadoc title after parsing

Fix javadoc title for JDK 11 which contains &.
Use try with resources on InputStream passed to SimpleTitleParser.
